about.title: About
about.description: I'm software developer with expertise in UI/UX design. I enjoy exploring new design trends and techniques to further improve my skills. I'm passionate about delivering high-quality work and collaborating with clients to bring their vision to life
about.heading: About me
about.paragraph: I'm software developer with expertise in UI/UX design. I enjoy exploring new design trends and techniques to further improve my skills. I'm passionate about delivering high-quality work and collaborating with clients to bring their vision to life

friends.title: Friends
friends.description: Welcome to the vibrant community of friends and colleagues who are an integral part of my journey! Here you can discover a diverse network of connections, each representing unique perspectives, talents, and passions.

cta.description: Would you like to get in here too ? Let's get to know each other, here are my links:

home.title: Home
home.description: I'm passionate about bringing ideas to life through code and technology. Whether it's building websites, apps, or software, I love the process of creating and sharing knowledge. I enjoy immersing myself in new topics and experiences, and I'm equally enthusiastic about teaching and sharing my expertise with others.
home.heading: Gleb (yànzhì, 燕智)

playlist.description: Welcome to my playlist lads. This is where I keep tracks and favorite albums that I've been listening to or am currently listening to.
